name: compass
sizes_available: can be made to any size
notes:
compass is an 8 point star blanket featuring the popcorn stitch in the star peaks.

this pattern was a request from a follower who was searching for a star blanket that incorporated the popcorn stitch, thus compass was born.

this pattern has been tested

pictures have been added to help along the way

this pattern can be made in any weight yarn

the ch 1 to close the popcorn is not counted as a stitch

please contact buttonnose crochet for full pattern support
